spatialNAcUtils 0.99.0
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Check the validity of arguments passed to multi_gene.R plotting functions

    dot-multi_gene_validity_check.Rd

    Also subset spe to the selected sample and genes, dropping genes with constant expression across spots

    .multi_gene_validity_check(spe, genes, sample_id, assayname, minCount, ...)

    Arguments

    spe

    A SpatialExperiment with colData column exclude_overlapping, passed to spatialLIBD::vis_gene or spatialLIBD::vis_clus

    genes

    character() of length >= 2 of gene names to plot in combination, expected to be in rownames(spe)

    sample_id

    character(1) passed to sampleid in spatialLIBD::vis_gene or spatialLIBD::vis_clus. Assumed to be a donor, possibly consisting of several capture areas to plot at once

    assayname

    character(1) passed to spatialLIBD::vis_gene

    minCount

    numeric(1) passed to passed to spatialLIBD::vis_gene

    ...

    Parameters accepted by spot_plot, excluding is_discrete or var_name, which are handled internally

    Value

    SpatialExperiment subsetted to the specified sample and to each of the non-constant-expression genes

    Author

    Nicholas J. Eagles

    Contents

    Developed by Nicholas J. Eagles.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
